title: Citizen Eco-Drive TI+IP Silver Tone Titanium Mens Watch  CA4240-82E - Overview
description:
Citizen Eco-Drive TI+IP Silver Tone Titanium Mens Watch - CA4240-82E
http://www.abt.com/product/92596/Citizen-CA424082E.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=CA424082E_20160126

Citizen combines a bold and sporty look with light-weight Super Titanium creating a timepiece that is not only great looking but comfortable to wear. Created from Citizens proprietary Super Titanium technology with a surface hardening finish called Duratect. The Ti+IP timepiece is 40 lighter than stainless steel and 5 times harder to resist scratches perfect for the man on the go. Featured here with Super Titanium case and bracelet black dial with bright red accents 1/5th-second chronograph 12/24-hour time and date.
Features:
• Movement: Eco-Drive B620
• Functions: 1/5 Second Chronograph 3 Hand 12/24-Hour Time
• Band: Silver-Tone Titanium Bracelet Fold Over Clasp with Push Button
• Case Size: 46mm
• Case Material: Silver-Tone Titanium
• Dial: Metal Dial
• Crystal: Sapphire Crystal
• Water Resistance: 0100M
